page.title: 17LOCAL ACTIVITIES 2.
page.content: There is a playgroup for pre-school children held at the First School. A number of local women attend The Country Women's Club which is run on similar lines to the Women's Institute. For the older generation a monthly meeting of the Thursday Club brings old friends together for a meal and a chat. The local sports teams include rugby, football and cricket.They all play in local leagues and each has achieved some very good results in recent times. Each year on the second Saturday in July {Puddletown Carnival}takes place.Many local people enter floats and a travelling fun fair is present. Money is collected to aid local and national charities.The week prior is full of money raising fun events.
